t:
I like my job as a surgeon, but I don't like to tell the patient's family that they died due to complications during the surgery.


I fear that someone will
figure out that the complications weren't accidents.
c:
Surprisingly, each of the dead patients have agreed to organ donation.



#surgeon #surgery #patient #murder #lie #complications #accident #crime
